*Hello, I hope you're having a good day! Could you write a blog post on “The Reincarnation of The Strongest Exorcist in Another World” I will leave majority of the formatting up to you and how you like to create blog posts. As I am still new and learning different types of writing styles. I do have a few suggestions on sections that you could add if you decide to. Character Development, random questions that one might have about the anime, Highlights of some of the action scenes, a pros and cons section, a conclusion section, related anime, etc. *

*Would you include a rating section at the bottom from MyAnimeList and Crunchyroll.If you need any more details let me know and I will get them to you as soon as possible.*

title: **WRITE AND DIRECT A 3D ANIMATION FIGHT**
description:
**Client: **Knicholas
**Title: **fight to the death between Tanjiro Vs Itadori?
**Word Count: **1200

***OPEN TO ALL***

Note from client:

Let me back up a bit. I run a YouTube channel called Just Fight Studios which is similar to Death Battle only all of my fight are in 3D.

As for the writing style, I'd like a little story with the fight; I don't want them to come out as butchers and fight for the sake of fighting like a video game. Basically, you'd be writing a 3 minute movie. The winner would be Tanjiro but the rest would be based on your best opinion.

So you would have to direct a fight via text form. you'll have to add the dialogue, what exactly happens in the scenes, and the overall story.

Here's a sample fight.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k6bp6OflTe8&t=2s
author: Knicholas
